Sentencas: Low-pressure plasma spray (LPPS) technology was applied to make scania-stabilized zirconia (ScSZ) thin films for solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Preparation of dense ScSZ thin films by plasma spraying with densified ScSZ powders

Sentencas: Agglomerated ScSZ powders and densified ScSZ powders sintered at high temperature were synthesized and sprayed to make dense ScSZ thin films in the LPPS processes.
Titulo: Preparation of dense ScSZ thin films by plasma spraying with densified ScSZ powders

Sentencas: SEM results indicate that the densified ScSZ powders can be easier molten in plasma stream to form more uniform and denser thin films.
Titulo: Preparation of dense ScSZ thin films by plasma spraying with densified ScSZ powders

Sentencas: The influence of spraying parameters on the microstructure of the films was investigated.
Titulo: Preparation of dense ScSZ thin films by plasma spraying with densified ScSZ powders

Sentencas: It is found that longer spraying distance was beneficial to the melting of the flying powders to make high-quality thin films.
Titulo: Preparation of dense ScSZ thin films by plasma spraying with densified ScSZ powders

Sentencas: The ionic conductivity of the thin film (about 20 mu m thick) was about 0.025 S/cm measured at 700 degrees C. A half-cell sample was made via air plasma spray process by using the densified ScSZ powder.
Titulo: Preparation of dense ScSZ thin films by plasma spraying with densified ScSZ powders

Sentencas: The result indicated that a denser and thinner ScSZ should be made for higher electrochemical property.
Titulo: Preparation of dense ScSZ thin films by plasma spraying with densified ScSZ powders
